column5: Our home is located on the hill in New Braunfels, just minutes from Schlitterbahn, Landa Park, the Comal and Guadalupe rivers, and downtown New Braunfels. It is also in walking distance of New Braunfels High School and Panther Canyon, which offers a short hike down to Landa Park. We welcome anyone looking to enjoy our great city and love our home as their own. We hope to make every guest as comfortable here as if they were in their own home.
column8: Ranch style home on the Hill
